condition.narrative: BRD shall update and submit to the Association for its review and approval a revised ESMS no later than February 15, 2021, andconsequently adopt such revised ESMS as shall have been approved in writing by the Association no later than February 28, 2021.(Schedule 2, Section I. I.4)

Not later than ninety (90) days from the effectiveness of this restructuring, the Recipient shall cause BRD to appoint within theBRD-SPIU, a senior housing finance advisor, a civil engineer and one environmental and one social safeguards specialist. (Schedule2, Section I. A.1)

Not later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall establish, and thereafter maintain, throughoutProject implementation, the PSC, with composition and mandate acceptable to the Bank, which shall be headed by high levelrepresentatives of MINECOFIN and include, inter alia, high level representatives of MININFRA, RHA, CoK, and other entities, asfurther detailed in the PIM. The PSC shall be responsible for coordinating, including at the inter-ministerial level, and providingoverall strategic guidance for Project implementation. (Schedule 2, Section I. A.3)

The Recipient shall: (a) no later than thirty (30) days before the Closing Date, prepare and present to the Association, an actionplan satisfactory to the Association on the outstanding measures and actions, including a timetable and budget allocation for suchmeasures and actions; and (b) carry out said action plan in accordance with its terms and in a manner acceptable to theAssociation.
